name: RNG Wizard
description:
RNG Wizard is a randomizer based spellcasting game.

Controls: WASD to move, I to enter inventory, click, Q, and E to cast, and number keys to navigate inventory. Click to progress dialogue and remove poppups.

PLEASE NOTE: This is my first ever game jam, and I kinda ran out of time. The screen two above the start screen is glitched so you can never leave it, and certain things that I intended to exist do not. I hope you can enjoy this for what it is. I do not expect to win. I made a game. I'm happy with that. Enjoy it for what it is, but please don't condemn it for what it isn't. I tried my hardest. 
PS: Making a metroidvania probably wasn't smart.
